hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
CENGN=slittle@build.starlingx.cengn.ca RSYNC_SSH="ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null"
rsync -avuzH -e "$RSYNC_SSH" --progress --exclude='*.new/' $CENGN:/export/mirror/centos /export/cengn-mirror/
rsync -avuzH -e "$RSYNC_SSH" --progress --exclude='*.new/' $CENGN:/export/mirror/debian /export/cengn-mirror/
rsync -avuzH -e "$RSYNC_SSH" --progress $CENGN:/export/mirror/starlingx/rc /export/cengn-mirror/starlingx/
rsync -avuzH -e "$RSYNC_SSH" --progress $CENGN:/export/mirror/starlingx/release /export/cengn-mirror/starlingx/
rsync -avuzH "$CENGN:/var/lib/jenkins/*.xml" "/localdisk/backups/CENGN/var/lib/jenkins/"
rsync -avuzH "$CENGN:/var/lib/jenkins/bin" "/localdisk/backups/CENGN/var/lib/jenkins/"
rsync -avuzH "$CENGN:/localdisk/designer/jenkins/*rc-*" "/localdisk/backups/CENGN/localdisk/designer/" || $(case "$?" in 0|23) exit 0 ;; *) exit $?; esac)
rsync -avuzH "$CENGN:/localdisk/loadbuild/jenkins/*rc-*" "/localdisk/backups/CENGN/localdisk/loadbuild/"
rsync -avuzH --exclude '/*/*/*/' -f"+ */" -f"+ config.xml" -f"- *" "$CENGN:/var/lib/jenkins/jobs" "/localdisk/backups/CENGN/var/lib/jenkins/"
